biotools.summary: Mutation To Cancer Therapy Scan. Systematically analyze mutations affecting cancer drug sensitivity based on individual genomic profiles. It was developed by leveraging the latest knowledge on mutation-cancer drug sensitivity associations and the results from large-scale chemical screening using human cancer cell lines.
